organizations: Manchester City of the Premier League
lead_paragraph: Sven-Goran Eriksson, the former manager of the English national team, has been hired as Mexico’s national team coach. Eriksson’s contract with Manchester City of the Premier League was terminated Monday after only one season in charge, and with two years remaining. .
